title: Dallas Mavericks concession stand prices ( beer , soft drink , hot dog ) 2010 to 2016
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 3 lines namely Beer, Soft drink, and Hot dog. The y axis represents Sales price in U.S. dollars and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Beer, Soft drink, and Hot dog are gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Sales price in U.S. dollars in descending order is: 1. Beer, 2. Hot dog, and lastly, 3. Soft drink.

Overall across the Year, Beer mostly maintained the highest Sales price in U.S. dollars when compared to others with a mean value of 5.83, and it peaked at 2010/11, 2011/12, 2012/13, 2013/14, and 2014/15.
After Beer, Hot dog overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 3.9, peaking at 2014/15.
The botommost line, Soft drink,  has a mean of 3.83, and peaked at 2010/11, 2011/12, 2012/13, 2013/14, and 2014/15.
